name: PackTheWorld
description:
Want to explore a perplexing world??

You will be playing as Snehith, an intelligent scientist who has recently invented an amazing instrument for a good motive. But wait!!! You have landed in a complex puzzle and you need to escape from this mysterious world. Play your way as you unravel the mysteries.

Key Features

  • 2D pixel art game.
  • Story based puzzle game.
  • Adventure story game
